author: Ross Burden
method: Place a bowl over a saucepan of simmering water. Add the chocolate and cream and stir until melted. Pour half of the chocolate sauce into a glass. Place some of the mango into the glass and top with the rest of the mixture. Decorate with a sprig of mint and place into the fridge to set for 15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz dark chocolate,  100ml/3½fl oz double cream,  ½ mango, peeled and sliced,  sprig of mint, to garnish
